definition: to report/to give an account of/report
Wen Wei Po (Hong Kong newspaper)/Wenhui News (Shanghai newspaper)

sentences.english: AnShan tiger surveillance to meet with dao Yin CuiGuoHuan confidential and report to RenHui.
sentences.chinese: 安善虎監視到道賢跟崔國煥機密見面，彙報給仁惠。

sentences.english: They will report on the experiments with coal tar.
sentences.chinese: 他們將彙報煤焦油的試驗情況。

sentences.english: The senior showcase is a highlight of our year at the Maryland School of the Arts.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是馬里蘭藝術學校高年級彙報演出。

sentences.english: When they debrief you, that's the story you'll tell.
sentences.chinese: 當他們聽取你的彙報時，那就是你要講述的故事。

sentences.english: It will be a spectacular show for the holiday season.
sentences.chinese: 這將是一場十分難得的精彩紛呈的彙報演出。

sentences.english: The court heared a report from the probation officer.
sentences.chinese: 法院聽取了監督緩刑官員的彙報。
頻繁地向高層彙報情況。

sentences.english: The captains report to the commandant that they are ready to accomplish their tasks.
sentences.chinese: 艦長向司令官彙報他們已經做好完成任務的準備。

sentences.english: After Bai Cong snow with Ye Lingqing a condition report quickly.
sentences.chinese: 之後，白叢雪趕快把這一情況跟葉凌青彙報。

sentences.english: Design heads reported directly to the president of each business unit.
sentences.chinese: 設計負責人直接向每個業務部門的總裁彙報工作。

sentences.english: The position will report to the BSR Beijing Director and be based in the Beijing office.
sentences.chinese: 彙報上級是BSR北京總監，工作地點在北京辦事處。

sentences.english: Emilio will report to Gustavo Arenas the new Chief Sales Officer.
sentences.chinese: 埃米利奧將直接彙報給古斯塔沃舞臺上的新銷售總監。

sentences.english: She attended Cabinet meetings and high level briefings.
sentences.chinese: 她參加內閣會議和高級的情況簡要彙報會。

sentences.english: Hear the report of Liang Liang Zhao Guibo mused.
sentences.chinese: 聽到鍾良的彙報趙貴波沉思不語。

sentences.english: Reports to Executive Housekeeper any irregularities observed on the partof the guests.
sentences.chinese: 向行政管家彙報任何在顧客部分的異常情況。

sentences.english: Idei, the Guo heard of the company's safety briefing.
sentences.chinese: 出井後，郭海聽取了該公司的安全生產情況彙報。

definition: to report/to give an account of/to collect information and report back
to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
to guide/to give directions/to direct/to coach/guidance/tuition/CL:個|个[ge4]
to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
to observe and emulate/to study (esp. following sb's example)
to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
